en_US: None
This does not have a location.
Incendium Keep
Ruled by the vicious Karkothian Brutes, their armies are universally feared.
Beast's Den
Beasts so fearful not even the Karkothian Tribes venture close.
Cross Roads
A bit of plains in the otherwise dense swamp, a relief to travellers, captured by Dungeonsia after Blue fell.
Dungeon City
The origin of the monsters, without their capital they are nothing. Ruled by the Skeleton King, this city of Skeletons fiercely resist invaders.
Fields
Just outside the swamplands this is the last place our great founder took before he fell.
Fishing Ville

On this long beach is the best spot to fish, locals believe the goddess Ps\u00e1ria lives here and blesses these waters. The northern parts of the ville have become desert-like due to the lack of wind getting past the mountains all around it.
Forests
A small settlement deep in the forests, perfect for all wood needs. There have been sightings of a mysterious group around here pillaging nearby villages.
Haven
Being on a small island, this city is safe from wars and conflict...for now.
Jungle
Its hard to live in this dense jungle, lots of valuable resources can be found here.
Mines
Lots of valuable resources are here in the mountains, being mined for millenia, at its depths is a mysterious ooze.
Mineshaft
A vital source of iron for the Kingdom of Dungeonsia.
Singed Pyramid
Built long ago as a fortress to keep out raiders from pillaging the pyroclast region, now it threatens to invade the rest of the island.
Port City
Understanding our strong market economy, Blue realised it was vital the first city taken would have a port.
Rubberport
A smaller port, built on the export of rubber. This is the coldest part of the Blue Republic, and frequently sees snow.
Silk Road
The local merchants here have a reliable source of silk, if only they would share their knowledge.
Sky City
The city Blue himself founded, prosperous and mighty. So close to the sky, many claim to see things in the clouds here.
The Clouds
Above the clouds is a mysterious location indeed.
Smithlands
Due to its connection to the mines this place has long been the smithing center, recently its exploded as an industrial city, home to all the republic's factories.
Ashen Valleys
No one crosses these valleys alive.
Witches' Swamp
The swamps are at the edge of republic might, here the witches live autonomously, although they produce our potions they cause lots of havoc.
Dyronix's Lair
Rumored to house the ancient legendary beast at the summit, though none have come back alive.
